Reviews.Title: Tech Support
Reviews.Author: Robert F. Hand
Reviews.Content: This is my second night owl purchase, bought the cheaper version only to have gotten a defective unit and finally getting through tech support (5 days later). I returned to purchase the pro series which is working for the most part but having issues accessing through my iPhone and again trying to get through tech support which is terrible and they sat its 24/7 support if ya got 7 days to wait but they let you leave a message and they would return your call of email them(good luck Im still waiting for the return follow up from the first camera system) as of right now tech support sucks, another mention is this comes with no manual but it is on the inclosed disc which I
